Question: Shelly Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shelly Group

Product: Gen3 Series IoT Devices

- Powerful new chip with 8MB of memory for improved device performance and efficiency
- Introduces "virtual components" for unified control of third-party devices
- Upgradable to the Matter standard for reliable and secure connectivity
- Includes Shelly H&T Gen3 Wi-Fi smart sensor, Shelly Mini Gen3 Series, and Shelly Qubino Wave Plug US
- Designed to reshape how users interact with their smart homes and businesses, offering more memory, compatibility, and extended functionalities
